r.s: Renderer driver that generates the XML string for a XUL listbox
r.d: This is a Renderer driver for Structures_DataGrid that generates the XML string for a XUL listbox.
r.n:
Changes since Structures_DataGrid 0.6.3:
- Renderer driver unbundled from Structures_DataGrid core - BC break: only the XML string for a XUL listbox is generated (the old renderer generated a complete XUL "page" which wasn't flexible enough in most cases)
